full_summary:
### Invitation to Tender

**Tender Title**: Request for Proposal - Technical Writer, Intermediate (SPTS)

**Tender Reference**: PW-22-01009836 

**Tender Solicitation Number**: W6431-230089/A

## Background

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the services of one (1) Technical Writer, Intermediate Level, to support 434 Operational Test and Evaluation (OT&E) Squadron in Trenton, ON. 

## Brief Description

The estimated level of effort of the contract will be 230 days per year. The period of the contract will be from the Contract Award date to 31 March 2023, with an option to extend the term of the contract by one (1) additional one (1) year period.

## Requirements and Conditions

*   The Contracting Authority requires a Technical Writer with an Intermediate Level of experience in project management services.
*   The Contractor must be a Supply Arrangement Holder under E60ZT-18TSPS, with qualifications at Tier 1.
*   The Contractor must be reliable, with a minimum security level required for the Company and Resource.
*   The Contracting Authority may negotiate with suppliers on the procurement.
*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Important Dates

*   **Publication Date:** October 12, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** October 28, 2022, at 14:00:00
*   **Estimated Delivery Date:** As mentioned in the tender

## Contact Information

*   **Contact Name:** Renee Davis
*   **Contact Email:** renee.davis@forces.gc.ca
*   **Contact Phone:** 343-645-5490

## Please Confirm the Following

Please confirm your company's Supply Arrangement Holder information and qualifications for the contract before submitting the bid.
